title: First Time in Love: Short Version
description: Do you remember the very first time you realize that you love someone of the same sex? I do. And this is my story about it...A move between high school and university had been a massive transition that Daniel had felt he wasn't quite prepared for. He had gone from being the very big fish in a relatively small pond to a microorganism in the ocean. Luckily he meets Harry who helps him with everything. Daniel begins to realize that he feels something mroe to Harry than ordinary friendship.This is Prologue and Chapter 1+2 from the First Time in Love from James Benedict Noble.
author: James Benedict Noble
